description:
While Lord Enma is passing judgement on the denizens of hell, we learn about Hozuki`s past. Was he always a demon or was he once human?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ancient Underworld Overhaul / The Palace with the Malice
Kamishiro Anoyo Kakumei / Uramitsurami Atte Koso
La réforme des Enfers / Les joies de la rancune
神代あの世革命 / 恨みつらみあってこそ
